name: sdks/openai/Simplified completion creator
description:
Creates a completion for the provided prompt.

It uses text-davinci-003 as model.

77151a8d-f339-4d97-ac15-e6cdd6a9a0cb.name: request
77151a8d-f339-4d97-ac15-e6cdd6a9a0cb.description:
Receives the request for creating the completion.

It uses text-davinci-003 as model.
The max_tokens default is 1000.

Example:
```
{
  "prompt": "What is the third planet?"
}
```

b362d0b8-194a-4d53-8893-3b3d3f7c4b7f.name: completion
b362d0b8-194a-4d53-8893-3b3d3f7c4b7f.description:
Sends the completion.

Example:
```
"\n\nThe third planet from the sun is Earth." 
```

5f6196b8-72bb-46f6-a05d-0cd889be3d77.type: {"id": string, "object": string, "created": number, "model": string, "choices": {optional "text": string, optional "index": number, optional "logprobs": ({optional "tokens": string[], optional "token_logprobs": number[], optional "top_logprobs": {string: any}[], optional "text_offset": number[]}[] or null), optional "finish_reason": string}[], "usage": {"prompt_tokens": number, "completion_tokens": number, "total_tokens": number}}
5f6196b8-72bb-46f6-a05d-0cd889be3d77.name: response
5f6196b8-72bb-46f6-a05d-0cd889be3d77.description:
Sends completion response.

See https://github.com/openai/openai-node/blob/master/api.ts

Example:
```
{
  "id": "cmpl-6nUAV4KYExmGXCqDTL7AdqyjHYF7i",
  "object": "text_completion",
  "created": 1677252059,
  "model": "text-davinci-003",
  "choices": [
    {
      "text": "\n\nThe third planet from the sun is Earth.",
      "index": 0,
      "logprobs": null,
      "finish_reason": "stop"
    }
  ],
  "usage": {
    "prompt_tokens": 6,
    "completion_tokens": 33,
    "total_tokens": 39
  }
} 
```

06b343c5-4652-47ad-a953-d198c4e718cf.name: error
06b343c5-4652-47ad-a953-d198c4e718cf.description: Sends any error occurred during the completion.
